record.name: LinkedData
record.description: Describes a linked data record. This record referes to the series data or text.
record.author: Glen Stampoultzis (glens at apache.org)

field.name: link type
field.description: What type of link is this?

const.name: title or text
const.description: links a series title or text

const.name: direct
const.description: reference to some text or a value entered directly into the formula bar

bit.name: custom number format
bit.description: true if this object has a custom number format
